extension_name.description: Extension name, the long variant (up to 45 characters)

extension_shortName.description: Extension name, the short variant (up to 12 characters)

extension_description.message: Google Chrome extension for monitoring YouTube channels for new videos.

browserAction_title.description: Title of the browser action button

options_pageTitle.description: Page title of the options page

options_title_short.description: In-page title of the options page (short version)

options_title_full.description: In-page title of the options page

options_menu_accounts.description: Label for menu item for account & subscriptions management in the options page

options_menu_videos.description: Label for menu item for video feed settings and preview in the options page

options_menu_synchronization.description: Label for menu item for synchronization in the options page

options_accounts_title.description: Title of the accounts and subscriptions management section in options

options_accounts_add.description: Label for button for adding new YouTube account

options_accounts_notSignedIntoBrowser.message: It appears that you are not currently signed into Chrome with your Google Account. Because of this, you will be asked to sign into Chrome when you attempt to add a YouTube account. Please sign into the Google account that is also the YouTube account you intend to add.
options_accounts_notSignedIntoBrowser.description: Warning shown to the user in case they are not signed into the browser

options_accounts_authorizationFailed.message: You have either canceled the authorization, or the authorization failed for some reason. If you want to add a different account than the one that was shown for authorization, you need to sign out of Chrome and sign into Chrome using the account you want to add.
options_accounts_authorizationFailed.description: Error message shown if the OAuth2 authorization process fails when adding a new account

options_accounts_incognito_Title.description: Header of the accounts managent section in options for incognito subscriptions

options_accounts_incognito_addPlaceholde.description: placeholder for the 'add incognito subscription' input

options_accounts_incognito_addingSubscri.description: Message shown when a new incognito subscription is being added

options_accounts_incognito_apiFailure.message: There appears to be a communication problem with the YouTube API. Because of this, the subscription cannot be added at this moment. Please repeat your attempt later.
options_accounts_incognito_apiFailure.description: Message shown if there is an error during communication with the YouTube API when adding an incognito subscription

options_accounts_incognito_invalidUrl_me.message: The address you have provided is not a valid address to a YouTube channel, user or playlist. Here are some examples of valid addresses:
options_accounts_incognito_invalidUrl_me.description: Message shown when an invalid YouTube channel, user or playlist URL is provided

options_accounts_incognito_invalidUrl_ex.description: The first example of a valid URL that can be used to add an incognito subscription
The second example of a valid URL that can be used to add an incognito subscription
The third example of a valid URL that can be used to add an incognito subscription

options_accounts_incognito_modal_close.description: label of the modal window closing button

options_accounts_incognito_modal_invalid.description: Title of the modal window shown when an invalid channel URL is provided

options_accounts_incognito_modal_invalid.message: While the address you provided seems to be in a valid form, it does not appear to lead to any YouTube channel - the channel may have been closed or does not exist. If you think the address is correct, please try again later, there may be an issue on the YouTube side.
options_accounts_incognito_modal_invalid.description: Message of the modal window shown when an invalid channel URL is provided
Title of the modal window shown when an invalid user URL is provided

options_accounts_incognito_modal_invalid.message: While the address you provided seems to be in a valid form, it does not appear to lead to any YouTube user - the user may have closed their account or does not exist. If you think the address is correct, please try again later, there may be an issue on the YouTube side.
options_accounts_incognito_modal_invalid.description: Message of the modal window shown when an invalid user URL is provided
Title of the modal window shown when an invalid playlist URL is provided

options_accounts_incognito_modal_invalid.message: While the address you provided seems to be in a valid form, it does not appear to lead to any YouTube playlist - the playlist may have been deleted or does not exist. If you think the address is correct, please try again later, there may be an issue on the YouTube side.
options_accounts_incognito_modal_invalid.description: Message of the modal window shown when an invalid playlist URL is provided

options_videos_title.description: Title of the video feed section of the options page

options_videos_showWatched.message: Show watched videos in the video feed
options_videos_showWatched.description: Label for the checkbox for showing watched videos in the video feed

options_synchronization_title.description: Title of the synchronization section of the options page

options_synchronization_synchronize.description: Label on the 'synchronize' button in the synchronization section of the options page

options_synchronization_shortDescription.message: Here you can synchronize the extension with your recent YouTube watch history of any of your accounts. This synchronization only marks the videos watched by the selected account as watched, it wont mark the rest as unwatched.
options_synchronization_shortDescription.description: Short, initial description of the synchronization section of the options page

options_synchronization_longDescription.message: The synchronization feature requires access to your private account data, which can be granted for only about an hour (unless the extension would request a 'refresh token', but there are other issues involved). That's why the synchronization is only on-demand and may require you to confirm your authorization. Please note that your watch history always contains only the videos for the last few days.
options_synchronization_longDescription.description: Long description of the synchronization feature at the bottom of the synchronization section of the options page
